title: wish you well (With. DAVII)
lyrics:
Neon eottae
Nan yejeoncheoleom ulgo haji anh-a
Balam ttawin heundeulji mos hae nal dasin
If you ileon nal almyeon jogeum
Seounhaljido molla
Geuttaeui nae moseub-eun mos bwa

Eojjeom neon yeong-wonhi nal ilh-eobeolin geoya

Yeoleo gamjeong-eul geochyeo

Ije naegeneun gomaun neoya

Nan jal jinaeni geogjeong-eun malgil

Nega daleun salam mannanda haedo

Jal salgil balal ppun-iji



Jal salgil balae

Hangsang mas-issneun geosdo

Jal chaeng-gyeo meoggo

Chuun nal-eneun

Gamgi geolliji anhge

Ttatteushage jal chaeng-gyeo ibgo

Jal doegil balae

Haneun il modu da

Neon ttogttoghanikka

Naege bad-eun salangboda

Deo keun salang bad-eumyeonseo

Jal sal-aya dwae



Ohilyeo jal doen geos gat-a

Neon na eobs-i deo jal sanikka

Nacheoleom mos doen salam malgo

Kkog jal haejuneun nom mannaseo

Haengboghaeya hae

Geu yeppeun us-eumdo ilhji malgo

Mianhaehaji anh-ado dwae

Nae singyeong-eun sseuji malgo

Geu nuguboda bichnadeon

Nal algi jeon neolo

Nunmulgwaneun eoulliji anhneun

Yejeon moseub-eulo

Jal jinae boyeo cham dahaeng-iya

Geulae neoui yeop-en naega eobs-eul ttae

Neodawo boineun geos gat-ae



Jal salgil balae

Hangsang mas-issneun geosdo

Jal chaeng-gyeo meoggo

Chuun nal-eneun

Gamgi geolliji anhge

Ttatteushage jal chaeng-gyeo ibgo

Jal doegil balae

Haneun il modu da

Neon ttogttoghanikka

Naege bad-eun salangboda

Deo keun salang bad-eumyeonseo

Jal sal-aya dwae



Sigan jinabomyeon

Geujeo kkumgat-eul geolago haessdeon

Ne mal-i majneun geos gat-ae

Gieoghalyeo aeleul sseobwado

Neon huimihaejyeoman ganeun kkumgatji



Jal salgil balae

Hangsang mas-issneun geosdo

Jal chaeng-gyeo meoggo

Chuun nal-eneun

Gamgi geolliji anhge

Ttatteushage jal chaeng-gyeo ibgo

Jal doegil balae

Haneun il modu da

Neon ttogttoghanikka

Naege bad-eun salangboda

Deo keun salang bad-eumyeonseo

Jal sal-aya dwae
